code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{TextField,Button,MenuItem,Box,Typography}from"@mui/material";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const courses=["JavaScript","React","Node.js","CSS","Python","Html","C#",".NET"];const UserForm=_ref=>{let{refresh}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState({username:"",course:""});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setUser(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async()=>{await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/users",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)});setUser({username:"",course:""});refresh();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",children:"Add User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,label:"Username",name:"username",value:user.username,onChange:handleChange,margin:"normal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,select:true,label:"Select Course",name:"course",value:user.course,onChange:handleChange,margin:"normal",children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{value:course,children:course},course))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,variant:"contained",fullWidth:true,children:"Submit"})]});};export default UserForm;
